subject: RE: [junit] how can i test JSP with JUnit?
msgSnippet: use HttpUnit http://httpunit.sourceforge.net/ For e.g. you can add input to form fields, submit and check the response text. ... From: hujd_cn
messageBody:
use HttpUnit
http://httpunit.sourceforge.net/

For e.g. you can add input to form fields, submit and check the response
text.

-----Original Message-----
From: hujd_cn [mailto:hujd_cn@...]
Sent: Thursday, November 04, 2004 3:54 PM
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [junit] how can i test JSP with JUnit?




it is quite straight to test java classes with JUnit by writing
input data to methods and asserting output. but how can i generate
input data to JSP and then check validation of output from web
server?
